_header: An leam is in the world I-lit

CamTCC323.First Lines:
On leome is in þis world ilistÞer of is muchel prisA
                    risen is god & þat is ristFrom deþe to
                    lif…
CamTCC323.Last Lines:
…Comit iblesede in to roþat lesten sal eueir
                    more
